segments.text: Does she make any sense to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It's all Greek to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know that . I mean I couldn't understand her at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me neither . All I have to do is study French hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish you the best of luck .
segments.speaker: S2
